issue.title: [Rust] Implement to_json() for Field and DataType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2385](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2385). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implementing JSON representation of DataType and Field as per Arrow specifications.
